attributes.action: urge the United Nations to take further action to reduce conflict in the Central African Republic.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Rebels in the Central African Republic have turned the country into an extremely dangerous place to live for civilians. We must help these people who are being forced to flee their country, by pushing the United Nations to take further action, preventing the situation from becoming even worse. Peoples human rights are being seriously breeched here so PLEASE SIGN!
